page.title: 05Children's Playground Games
page.content:
The children of Coatham C.E.Primary School play a variety of games. It was noticed that the boys and girls in the Infants played together a lot. The opposite happened with the Juniors. Lines on the Junior playground are used for many games such as Tigs on Lines and Hopscotch.
Queenie is a popular ball game with the older children. The aim is to throw the ball and hit somebody who was playing. Once you are hit you then join up to throw the ball at others playing the game. The game is over when everyone is hit.
